00024 namespace uStreamLib {
00025         ControlPin::ControlPin(void)
00026                 : _cmserial(0)
00027         {
00028                 // nothing to do
00029         }
00030 
00031         ControlPin::~ControlPin(void)
00032         {
00033                 // nothing to do

00036         int32 ControlPin::init(Block* b, // parent block
00037         uint32 bufsz, // preferred buffer size
00038         uint32 bufcount, // preferred count of buffers
00039         int32 queuesz     // queue size
00040         )
00041         {
00042                 int32 ret = 0;
00043 
00044                 // initialize parent
00045                 ret = Pin::init(b, "ControlPin", DIR_IO, bufsz, bufcount);
00046                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00047                         return FAILURE;
00048 
00049                 // initialize queue
00050                 ret = _iq.init(getAbsoluteName(), sizeof(cmessage), queuesz,
00051                                         US_PRIORITY_LEVELS, US_OOB_QUEUE_SIZE);
00052                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00053                         return FAILURE;
00054 
00055                 // setup data type    
00056                 setDataType(DT_BYTES);
00057 
00058                 // ok
00059                 return SUCCESS;
00060         }
00061 
00062         int32 ControlPin::init(char* name, // pin's name
00063         uint32 bufsz, // preferred buffer size
00064         uint32 bufcount, // preferred count of buffers
00065         int32 queuesz     // queue size
00066         )
00067         {
00068                 int32 ret = 0;
00069 
00070                 // initialize parent
00071                 ret = Pin::init(NULL, name, DIR_IO, bufsz, bufcount);
00072                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00073                         return FAILURE;
00074 
00075                 // initialize queue
00076                 ret = _iq.init(getAbsoluteName(), sizeof(cmessage), queuesz,
00077                                         US_PRIORITY_LEVELS, US_OOB_QUEUE_SIZE);
00078                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00079                         return FAILURE;
00080 
00081                 // setup data type
00082                 setDataType(DT_BYTES);
00083 
00084                 // ok
00085                 return SUCCESS;
00086         }

00088         int32 ControlPin::sendMessage(cmessage* m, int32 priority)
00089         {
00090                 Enumeration* en = NULL;
00091                 int32 ret = 0;
00092 
00093                 if (getStatus() == Pin::UNCONNECTED) {
00094                         // DEBUG 
00095                         UOSUTIL_DOUT(("unconnected")); 
00096                         return FAILURE;
00097                 }
00098 
00099                 m->serial = _cmserial++;
00100 
00101                 en = getPeers();
00102                 while (en->hasMoreElements()) {
00103                         ControlPin* p = (ControlPin*) en->nextElement();
00104 
00105                         // DEBUG
00106                         UOSUTIL_DOUT(("ControlPin::sendMessage(): -> %s\n",
00107                                 p->getAbsoluteName()));
00108 
00109                         ret = p->_iq.put((char *) m, sizeof(cmessage), priority);
00110                         if (ret == FAILURE)
00111                                 return FAILURE;
00112                 }
00113 
00114                 return SUCCESS;
00115         }
00116 
00117         int32 ControlPin::trySendMessage(cmessage* m, int32 priority)
00118         {
00119                 Enumeration* en = NULL;
00120                 int32 ret = 0;
00121 
00122                 if (getStatus() == Pin::UNCONNECTED) {
00123                         // DEBUG
00124                         UOSUTIL_DOUT(("unconnected")); 
00125                         return FAILURE;
00126                 }
00127 
00128                 m->serial = _cmserial++;
00129 
00130                 en = getPeers();
00131                 while (en->hasMoreElements()) {
00132                         ControlPin* p = (ControlPin*) en->nextElement();
00133 
00134                         // DEBUG
00135                         UOSUTIL_DOUT(("ControlPin::trySendMessage(): -> %s\n",
00136                                 p->getAbsoluteName()));
00137 
00138                         ret = p->_iq.tryPut((char *) m, sizeof(cmessage), priority);
00139                         if (ret == FAILURE) {
00140                                 /* to replace with logging methods */
00141                                 /*
00142                                                   printf
00143                                                          (
00144                                                           "ControlPin::trySendMessage(): failed for %s\n",
00145                                                           p->getAbsoluteName()
00146                                                           );
00147                                                   */
00148                                 // DEBUG
00149                                 UOSUTIL_DOUT(("ControlPin::trySendMessage(): failed for %s\n",
00150                                         p->getAbsoluteName()));
00151                         }
00152                 }
00153 
00154                 return ret;
00155         }
00156 
00157         int32 ControlPin::recvMessage(cmessage* m)
00158         {
00159                 if (getStatus() == Pin::UNCONNECTED) {
00160                         // DEBUG
00161                         UOSUTIL_DOUT(("unconnected")); 
00162                         return FAILURE;
00163                 }
00164 
00165                 return _iq.get((char *) m, sizeof(cmessage));
00166         }
00167 
00168         int32 ControlPin::tryRecvMessage(cmessage* m)
00169         {
00170                 if (getStatus() == Pin::UNCONNECTED) {
00171                         // DEBUG
00172                         UOSUTIL_DOUT(("unconnected")); 
00173                         return FAILURE;
00174                 }
00175 
00176                 return _iq.tryGet((char *) m, sizeof(cmessage));
00177         }
